name: Breakneck 2: Break Harder
description:
THE WAIT IS OVER!

Description-

Breakneck 2 is the sequel to breakneck, a very bad but good game i made a while ago. In this game, you destroy turrents by ramming into them, but avoid taking hits to the head, because that makes you lose health. Ramp up combos to gather more points, and add upgrades for more health, or just add length for the memes. 

Controls:

Computer- Hold W to gather speed, let go to launch. use a and d to rotate

Mobile-Hold your finger to gather speed, and let go to launch. The angle from the head of the snake to your finger is the direction you will launch.

-Deliriny2020
